analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahīnaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā majjhimo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na hīnam na kusalam dhammam paccayā majjhimaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Nahīnaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hīno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hīnam na akusalam dhammam paccayā hīnaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahīnaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na hīnam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca majjhimaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
